title: Finding the Y-Intercept
text: We must setet $$x$$ equal to $$0$$ and solve for f(x) in order to find the y-intercept. This leaves us with $$\frac{-94}{12}$$.

title: Finding the X-Intercept
text: We must now set f(x) equal to $$0$$ and solve for $$x$$. $$94-2x^2=0$$. $$2x^2=94$$ x=sqrt(47),-sqrt(47)
